tspan.tspan: Left: Identification of segments with 'Specific' (i.e. positive control or mutant) cDNA reads depends on the setting of indicated parameters (bold,

text.tspan: capitalized). UNSPECLOG10 sets a threshold for reads with some overlap to reads in the negative control; The demarcation of read segments

tspan.tspan: that bridges peaks remaining after filtering 'unspecific' reads. Obvious

text.tspan: peaks shared by all samples could indicate a ncRNA.

tspan.tspan: Right: Munro reads form the bulk of siRNAs, anti-sense to a transcript; Corbett reads are sense. Munro and Corbett reads are mixed when

text.tspan: transcripts from opposite strands overlap and are both targeted by RNAi (e.g. transposon T3 in Cryptococcus deneoformans).
